Package utility

Class AppointmentQuery

java.lang.Object
utility.AppointmentQuery
public class AppointmentQuery extends Object
This class holds methods used to pull information from the database regarding appointment records.

    • AppointmentQuery

      public AppointmentQuery()

  • Method Details

    • getAllAppointments

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getAllAppointments() throws SQLException
      This method uses a SELECT query to the database to get all the appointments currently there. It then reads the result of the query and puts each appointment into an ObservableList that is then returned by the function.
      Returns:
      an observable list of all the appointments in the database
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • getAllAppointmentsExceptChosen

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getAllAppointmentsExceptChosen(int appointmentId) throws SQLException
      This method makes a SELECT query to the database to get all appointments except for the one the user inputs as a parameter.
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - the appointment ID number that is to be left out of the returned ObservableList
      Returns:
      an ObservableList that gets all appointments in the database except for the one the user wanted to be excluded
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • insert

      public static int insert(String title, String description, String location, String type, Timestamp start, Timestamp end, Timestamp createDate, String createdBy, Timestamp lastUpdate, String lastUpdatedBy, int customerId, int userId, int contactId) throws SQLException
      This function executes a query to the database that inserts a new appointment to the database. It takes as parameters pieces of information for each column in the Appointment table in the database.
      Parameters:
      title - title of the appointment
      description - description of the appointment
      createdBy - the user who created the appointment
      contactId - the id of the contact associated with the appointment
      userId - the id of the user associated with the appointment
      lastUpdate - the last date and time the appointment was updated
      lastUpdatedBy - the user who last updated the appointment
      createDate - the date the appointment was created
      customerId - the id of the customer associated with the appointment
      location - the location of the appointment
      type - the type of the appointment
      start - the start date and time of the appointment
      end - the end date and time of the appointment
      Returns:
      an integer of the number of rows inserted into the database to verify the appointment was added
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • getCustomerAppointments

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getCustomerAppointments(int customerId) throws SQLException
      This function uses a customer ID number and SELECT query to get all the appointments from the database for that particular customer.
      Parameters:
      customerId - the ID of the customer we want the appointments for
      Returns:
      the ObservableList of all the appointmentes a customer has
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • getContactAppointments

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getContactAppointments(int contactId) throws SQLException
      This function gets all appointments associated with a particular contact from the database using a SELECT query.
      Parameters:
      contactId - the ID number of the contact
      Returns:
      an ObservableList of all appointments associated with a particular contact
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • read

      public static Appointment read(int appointmentId) throws SQLException
      This function reads an individual appointment record from the database from the Appointment table and its corresponding information from the Contact table.
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - the appointment ID number to retrieve a record for
      Returns:
      the Appointment object created from an appointment record in the database, including contact information
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • update

      public static int update(int appointmentId, String title, String description, String location, String type, Timestamp start, Timestamp end, Timestamp lastUpdate, String lastUpdatedBy, int customerId, int userId, int contactId) throws SQLException
      This function updates an existing Appointment in the database using an UPDATE query. It has one parameter to identify the existing appointment, and the other parameters contain the updated appointment information.
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - the appointment ID of the record to be updated, used for identification
      contactId - the updated contact ID associated with the appointment
      end - the updated end date and time of the appointment
      start - the updated start date and time of the appointment
      type - the updated type of the appointment
      location - the updated location of the appointment
      customerId - the updated customer ID associated with the appointment
      lastUpdatedBy - the date and time the record is being updated
      userId - the updated user ID assigned to the appointment
      lastUpdate - the user who is currently updating the appointment
      title - the updated title of the appointment
      description - the updated description of the appointment
      Returns:
      an integer indicating how many rows were updated, verifying the completion of the database query
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • delete

      public static int delete(int appointmentId) throws SQLException
      This function deletes a chosen appointment from the database.
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - the ID of the appointment to be deleted
      Returns:
      an integer indicating how many rows were deleted, verifying the deletion of the appointment from the database
      Throws:
      SQLException
